meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

participants: Jamieson Davis of ELEVATED SYSTEMS, INC.

agenda_items.title: Development Plans
agenda_items.description: An application for a development plan on property zoned Subdistrict 5 Urban Center & Subdistrict 6 Urban Core within Planned Development No. 655.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for a late-hours establishment limited to a restaurant without drive-in or drive-through service.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a new subdistrict on property zoned RS-C Regional Service Commercial Subdistrict.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Subdistrict 1D within Planned Development District No. 714.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for WR-3 Walkable Urban Residential District on property zoned an IR Industrial Research District.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for a TH-3(A) Townhouse District with deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application to create one 13.672-acre lot from a tract of land in City Block 6113.

agenda_items.title: Certificate of Appropriateness for Signs
agenda_items.description: An application for a Certificate of Appropriateness for a 450-square-foot non-illuminated attached mesh banner sign.

agenda_items.title: Items for Reconsideration
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the July 25, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing and the August 8, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing.
